Name: Shush
Description:
Blank each effect of one encounter card until tomorrow.
Read ahead twice.

Name: Stamp
Description:
If you have drawn a hero card from anywhere this turn, deal 2 damage to one enemy.
Read ahead twice.

Name: Paper Cut
Description:
Deal 1 damage to one enemy.
Draw two cards from your deck, then discard a hero card from your hand.

Name: Relax
Description:
Read ahead once.
Recover 2 vitality.
Draw a card from your deck.

Name: Organize
Description:
Read ahead three times.
Draw two cards from your deck.
